comments.message: I don't get today's Ferraris. I grew up with the 275 GTB, the Dino, the Daytona, the 365 GTBB, the 308... I hate to say it, but today's Ferraris are so bad that the smart thing to do, I think, is to put an older classic one in the garage. While they are the same price. But that's changing fast. I think the new designs are the cause.
Once you’re bitten by the Ferrari bug, you keep craving for more!!

I agree with all here.  First  the brand has to move forward can’t continue to make the saaaame cars.   That said I feel the brand is becoming a bit diluted with all these new models.  I do appreciate that I can drive my California just about anywhere the GT clearance makes it a great “ driver” and I want to drive it. Not look at it in a garage.  The real issue is this is a public company now. So profits and bottom line matter and profits are driven by units. I feel for you purists. But this is likely to continue.  Expect an SUV soon probably.
In my opinion, the 812 is one of the ugliest-looking Ferraris and this is one of the most boring-looking ones! Keep up the good work!

Bisogna cambiare e subito prima che sia troppo tardi e prendere esempio dalla Lamborghini Bisogna rispettare il dna del marchio ma la Ferrari come Design deve ritornare ad essere protagonista s fare lei scuola come faceva con Pininfarina e non come fa oggi che è costretta a copiare il noioso design delle auto tedesche che con lo stile Ferrari non ha nulla a che fare

Beauty is in the eye of the beholder and more people are raving about this beauty. Not only is every inch a work of art, it has a specific functionality in the design. Get in the driver seat and hit the road, I guarantee you will not only feel the exhilaration of Power, but also the creamy smoothness of the ride, like being on a magic carpet. The Cavallino is a heart stealer. Ferrari is a lifestyle.
I have so much passion for Ferrari as a brand ,well more often the designs really not that spectacular but I do want each and every one of it

Im a Ferrari Guy...BUT I Dont like it all...Those wheels Yuk! Too much like a California. That black vent on the front bumper is for what? looks like a patch. Nothing special..the same design has been out for a while now..so no real WOW factor at all. Come on Ferrari Step it up!
I think it has too aggressive styling. California's lines were more elegant, more proper for a roadster. But it looks great anyway. ✌️

Büyük etken ise daha motosikletle Ülkemde takır tukur yollarda amasitörleri 3 yılda değiştirmezsem olmuyor, bunu alsam kullanayım desem 1 aylıkken hurdaya ayrılır. Çocuklu aile babası olmakta cayma sebebim. Birde benim oğlan bana bırakmaz kızlar evlenmek için sıraya girer başım ağrır.. Baş ağrıtacak arabaya binmenin tek mantığı gösteriş manyaklığı ile hava atmaktır.Hava atmak içinde yaşamımı bu kadar eksi ile zehir edemem.. Sizlere iyi satışlar... ;)
